CustomField.formula: CASE( Covid_19_Result__c, "Negative", IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_green.gif", "green"), "Positive", IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_red.gif", "red"), "Family Member Positive", IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_red.gif", "red"), IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif", "yellow") )
CustomField.label: Vaccination Status
